content: show off your hipster side with this fabulous ribbed pompom hat this pattern gives instructions for quick stretchy ribbed knit hat with large pompom instructions are for one unisex adult size the hat is very stretchy and can accommodate a wide range of heads difficulty level intermediate you will need to know how to join in the round k1 below and p1 below instructions are included on the website other crochet/knit tutorials and free patterns available at www classycrochet wordpress com
